title: Gaming restrictions I.e. LeaverBuster
body: Riot should make it if you have the LeaverBuster thing and you have to wait 20 minutes or any time you should be still allowed to message people cause i was duoing with a mate who had it for 20, and i got a message/friend request druing it and it had 10 minutes left AND I HAD TO FUCKING WAIT FOR THE REST OF THE TIME BEFORE I COULD EITHER MSG THEM BACK OR ACCEPT IT

replies.body: That is part of the punishment, I had it and I accept it
